1.title: President Bush Reacts to Osama Bin Laden's Death with Will Ferrell

episode of.title: The Very Best of Will Ferrell (TV Series 2007–2014)

1.plot: Barack Obama sent Navy Seal Team 6 to take out Osama Bin Laden in Abbottabad and made a statement confirming it on Sunday night. Former President George W. Bush finally responds to who and what has been terrorizing him for years.
